release_notes.en-US: Version 2.7. 1) When this add-on is disabled/removed from Add-ons Manager, defaults are restored. 2) At removing menu bar icons, if not being in icons, remove button would not be run. December 5th 2020. From Sungho Hwang.

description.en-US: Version 2.7. updated in 2020-12-06. 1) When this add-on is disabled/removed from Add-ons Manager, defaults are restored. 2) At removing menu bar icons, if not being in icons, remove button would not be run. Move tabs in status bar and iconify menu bar. This add-on researches new tabs' position and menubar iconification. This add-on is good to view it on Light theme or FrameWhite. This add-on is as role as if task bar of Windows. To Hyun-geol who I like. Life in Holy Spirit. [Survey for menu bar icons] I had collected and utilized each icon of major Thunderbird icons except Events and Tasks icon. Events and Tasks icon was created that left event icon and right task icon were placed on halves, and a diagonal line was cross two halves. I wonder that each icon would be proper to each menu item. Would you let me know whether each icon would be improved or not? [Notifications] I understood that tabs in status bar are not seen fully if installing SmartTemplates. [Next improvements] 1) Minimal height of SmartTemplate4Messenger would be set in 30px for both users. About all-day persistence of this program. If not closing operating system, please, use Minimize on Close.
